titleStmt.title: The fall and euill successe of rebellion from time to time wherein is contained matter, moste meete for all estates to vewe. Written in old Englishe verse, by VVilfride Holme.
titleStmt.author: Holme, Wilfrid.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Binneman dwelling in Knightriders streate, at the signe of the Mermaide. And are to be sold at his shop at the northwest doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: End of text dated 14 July 1537; on the Pilgrimage of Grace.
Running title reads: The fall of rebellion.
A variant of the edition with title page undated.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Knightriders streate, at the signe of the Mermaide. And are to be sold at his shop at the northwest doore of Paules Church
